snippet: Samsung built its brand by deftly copying and expanding on products developed by rivals, but its recent battle with Apple has highlighted to South Koreans how the company comes up short on genuine innovation.
abstract: Samsung built its brand by deftly copying and expanding on products developed by rivals, but its recent battle with Apple has highlighted to South Koreans how the company comes up short on genuine innovation.

headline.main: South Korea Looks to Samsung and Sees Itself
